triples.subject: Android Multi-View
triples.context: Multiview functionality in Unreal Engine 5.6 requires the ASIS plugin to be enabled first

triples.subject: ASIS Plugin
triples.context: To use ASIS plugin, developers must first setup Android SDK and NDK development environment

triples.subject: Unreal Engine Android Development
triples.context: UE uses Android Studio and Android SDK Command-Line Tools for Android project development

triples.subject: ASIS Plugin
triples.context: The ASIS plugin includes a specialized template for automotive HMI and vehicle cockpit development

triples.subject: ASISConnection
triples.context: ASISConnection class implements callback interfaces for handling service connection events

triples.subject: ASISConnection
triples.context: ASISConnection class implements message listener interface for engine communication

triples.subject: Multiview
triples.context: Multiview implementation requires creating and registering multiple Camera Actors in the level

triples.subject: ASIS Plugin
triples.context: The plugin generates client libraries (aar/jar) that are used in Android client applications

triples.subject: Android Client App
triples.context: Client applications use ASIS client libraries to establish communication with the Unreal Engine service

triples.subject: ASISConnection
triples.context: ASISConnection class provides methods for attaching/detaching surfaces for rendering

triples.subject: Unreal Engine Project
triples.context: Adding ASIS templates requires modifying TemplateCategories.ini file in the engine

triples.subject: ASIS Plugin
triples.context: ASIS plugin needs MultiWindow plugin remapping when adding to existing projects

triples.subject: Android Packaging
triples.context: Packaging an Unreal Engine project with ASIS generates a service APK for Android

triples.subject: ConnectionBuilder
triples.context: ConnectionBuilder class follows builder pattern to create configured ASISConnection instances

triples.subject: Multiview
triples.context: For Multiview to work, cameras must be registered with ASIS using specific camera IDs

triples.subject: ASIS Service
triples.context: The service can receive and process touch events from attached surfaces

triples.subject: Android Development
triples.context: Android development with Unreal Engine involves using ADB for installing and running APKs

triples.subject: ASIS Architecture
triples.context: The architecture diagram shows different supported communication patterns between client and service
